abstract: Jake Silverstein, noting that nearly 30 million children worldwide have been driven from their homes by war and persecution in recent years, introduces portraits of three such children; all three stories will be included in multimedia documentary project that includes, for the first time in history of The New York Times, a virtual-reality film.
lead_paragraph: Nearly 60 million people are currently displaced from their homes by war and persecution — more than at any time since World War II. Half are children. This multimedia journey in text, photographs and virtual reality tells the stories of three of them.
